identified-content.object.title: Contender, the (Movie)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

abstract.p: Photo of Joan Allen in movie The Contender

block.p: Correction: October 16, 2000, Monday A front-page picture credit in Weekend on Friday with a contents entry for a film review of ''The Contender,'' starring Joan Allen, misspelled the photographer's given name. It is Gino Mifsud, not Gina.

Correction: October 16, 2000, Monday A front-page picture credit in Weekend on Friday with a contents entry for a film review of ''The Contender,'' starring Joan Allen, misspelled the photographer's given name. It is Gino Mifsud, not Gina.
